properties.areaDesc: Greene, GA; Oconee, GA; Clarke, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 2:48PM EST until February 22 at 3:34AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Oconee River near Milledgeville affecting Baldwin...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Washington and Wilkinson
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Mount Vernon affecting Montgomery...Treutlen and
Wheeler Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Penfield.
* Until late Friday night.
* At 2 PM Wednesday the stage was 13.7 feet...and rising.
* Minor flooding will continue.
* Flood stage is 13 feet.
* The river will continue rising to near 14.7 feet by early Friday
morning. The river will fall below flood stage Friday before
midnight.
* At 15 feet...Minor flooding continues to expand into fields...
woodlands and pastures...mainly on the right bank of the river...
upstream and downstream from the gage on the Georgia Highway 15
bridge.
